text: [Music]
try to imagine a country the size of
California with one-sixth the population
and 860 uniquely spoken languages
that's Papua New Guinea in a nutshell
guys I've only been here for like 24
hours but I'm loving it so far it feels
like I'm on another planet and I can't
wait to tell you all about it
Papua New Guinea is a nation of
indigenous people 97% of all land is
tribal land there are more than 860
distinct languages and ethnic groups in
a population of seven million people
that's one language for every 8200
people thank you crazier 12% of all the
world's languages are in this tiny
country hello do you care query
Navi lives in pron in Canada now that's
in boota boota Miyuki
and again if i gamble not not only is
Papua New Guinea the most culturally and
linguistically diverse nation on earth
but it's also the most rural 82% of
people live in rural areas outside of
cities like port moresby and they're all
so friendly the country's terrain is
mostly mountainous with rolling
foothills and lovely coastal lowlands
the water is as beautiful as in Fiji
but unlike Fiji Papua New Guinea is not
built for tourism as few Outsiders
venture down here it's like an
unexplored Wonderland of greenery most
roads are not paved
for about four time there are a few
hotels in town and nothing else when you
get out it's just a wild adventure that
I still cannot comprehend but I came to
wonder how can you combine a thousand
tribes in a small country like this how
can they all get along without knowing
each other or speaking each other's
language the answer is it's not easy in
fact it's a constant struggle that
locals are facing today it's challenging
to bring together you know all these
different tribes and family and clan
lines are still you know the priority
for most people and we do have
traditional practice of tribal fighting
the tribal fight can go for years
children are unable to go to school food
those kind of things it's a big-gun
impediment to development I've already
learned so much today about Papua New
Guinea and it's only getting started
I'm drew pinsky and if you like my
travel videos please click Subscribe and
join me as I plan to visit every country
in the world
